name: Your Edges Don't Belong Here
description:
You are a square. In a circular world, that will not do. Please accept our cure, so you can become like us.

(Written in Wingdings.  Playable in Windows only.)

__________

This was partially inspired by The Primitive Jam, whose deadline past by the time I came across it. I've always wanted to make a Twine in Wingdings, and this was a good opportunity to.

Note: The game may not look right on mobile devices.

The game idea I used:

░░░░░░░
░ GAME IDEA
░░░░░░░
░
░░░░
░ YOU ARE A CUBE
░░░░
░
░░░░░░░░
░ IN A SPHERE'S WORLD

I tweaked it so the game is now about a square in a circle's world.

There are 3 endings.
